history.narrative: Law 7-137 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-282, which was referred to the Committee on Housing and Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 3, 1988 and May 17, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 1, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-187 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
